price: 11. And when it is said to them: "Make not mischief on the earth," they say: "We are only peace-makers."
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ لَا تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّمَا نَحۡنُ مُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahum lā tuf'sidū fī al-arḍi qālū innamā naḥnu muṣ'liḥūna
